title: Verify Inflight email should use default value , when dlp-settings feature is configured via feature flag
custom_steps:
- Ensure dlp-settings configuration is disabled
- Route some email traffics
- Make dlp-settings change to enabled - True
- Verify inflight emails  and send new emails and verify new emails max_file_size and timeout values
custom_expected:
- Verify DLP config is created only when the configuration in the feature_config_smtp.json changes. 
- Log to check:
    LOG(NOTICE) << "Created DLP Config for tenantid=" << tenantId                << "; with maxFileSize=" << dlpConfig->m_maxFileSz                << "; timeout=" << dlpConfig->m_server.m_timeout;
- Verify before config change inflight emails , uses default max size and timeout values and new emails uses newer DLP config with higher max file size and timeout values.
